document.full_text: u.s. investigators have impounded an air france a380 which collided with a smaller jet at new york's john f. kennedy airport on monday but the airline says transatlantic a380 flights will be unaffected.
document.title: u.s. probes a380 taxiway collision in new york
lines_and_colors: u.s. investigators have impounded an air france a380 which collided with a smaller jet at new york's john f. kennedy airport on monday but the airline says transatlantic a380 flights will be unaffected.
